author: Epic Games
description:
Ready to go back topside? The ARC Raiders Server Slam is an open test running from October 17-20. Jump in, battle for high-stakes loot, and push servers to their limit in this expansive Extraction Adventure from Embark Studios before the game’s October 30 launch on the Epic Games Store. 

Available for pre-purchase now. https://epic.gm/arc-raiders
title: ARC Raiders Server Slam | Pre-Purchase Now!
